I want to create a reminder to buy New balance hiking shoes on the To do reminder app

Click on button with the function of "Open"
Click on button with the text "Add Reminder"
Click on button with the text "Remind me to.."
Type text: Buy New balance hiking shoes
Click on button with the text "SAVE"
Check status: successful

I want to edit the reminder to buy new Balance hiking shoes with a reminder date of December 21st on the To-Do reminder app.

Click on button with the text "Buy New Balance Hiking shoes"
Click on button with the text "Edit"
Click on point (984,1488)
Click on button with the text "MORE"
Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "Tue, Dec 19, 2023"
Click on button with the text "21"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the text "SAVE"
Check status: successful

I accidentally put the timing for a favorite drinks reminder at the wrong hour, thus I want to change it on the reminder app to 8 p.m.

Click on point (720,716)

Click on button with the text "Time"
Click on button with the text "8"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the function of "Save as reminder and go back to home page."
Check status: successful

Create a new reminder for date 20 june, time 1:00 pm with the title Station and add a note pick up in Reminder app

Open App: Reminder
Click on button with the function of "Create new reminder."
Click on button with the text "Title"
Type text: Station
Click on button with the text "Description"
Type text: Pick up
Click on button with the text "06/12/2023"
Click on button with the text "20"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the text "12:23 PM"
Click on button with the text "1"
Click on button with the text "00"
Click on button with the text "PM"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the function of "Save as reminder and go back to home page."
Check status: successful

Create a new reminder for Date: 15 Jun, Time: 7:30pm with the title: Movie & add a note Avatar the way of water in the reminder app

Open App: Reminder
Click on button with the function of "Create new reminder."
Click on button with the text "Title"
Type text: movie
Click on button with the text "Description"
Type text: avatar the way of water
Click on button with the text "06/12/2023"
Click on button with the text "15"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the text "Time"
Click on button with the text "7"
Click on button with the text "30"
Click on button with the text "PM"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Click on button with the function of "Save as reminder and go back to home page."
Check status: successful
